title: Iraq sends displaced people home - despite the dangers
text:
Iraq sends displaced people home - despite the dangers 3:52am EST - 01:56 
People displaced by Iraq's war against Islamic State are being returned to unsafe areas, allegedly in order to ensure elections go ahead in May.   
People displaced by Iraq's war against Islamic State are being returned to unsafe areas, allegedly in order to ensure elections go ahead in May.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/01/08/iraq-sends-displaced-people-home-despite?videoId=380917403&videoChannel=117760
